thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Mark Sibbald
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Mark Sibbald

author: Mark Sibbald
title: Mark Sibbald
text: Ordered some last minute embroidered jackets for the end of the year. During the artwork review process, they noticed that the color of some text would not show up well against the color of the jacket, so they contacted me and suggested a change. This was after I had already approved the work. The text color was changed, and the jackets look great. Would use them again.
